00029 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00030 #include "ht32.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00032 
00033 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00034   * @{
00035   */
00036 
00037 /** @addtogroup SLED_Examples SLED
00038   * @{
00039   */
00040 
00041 /** @addtogroup RGB
00042   * @{
00043   */
00044 
00045 
00046 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 #define LED_STRIP_DISP_LEN            (44)    /* 44 LEDs on the LED Strip                                   */
00048 #define LED_GRB_DATA_LEN              (3)     /* 3 bytes                                                    */
00049 #define LED_NUMBER_OF_COLOR_TYPES     (8)     /* 8 color type                                               */
00050 
00051 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 void SLED_Configuration(void);
00053 void SLED_MainRoutine(void);
00054 static void __Delay(u32 count);
00055 
00056 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00057 u8 __ALIGN4 gGRBTable[LED_NUMBER_OF_COLOR_TYPES][LED_GRB_DATA_LEN] = {
00058   { 0x00, 0xFF, 0x00 },     /* Red                                                                          */
00059   { 0xA5, 0xFF, 0x00 },     /* Orange                                                                       */
00060   { 0xFF, 0xFF, 0x00 },     /* Yellow                                                                       */
00061   { 0x80, 0x00, 0x00 },     /* Green                                                                        */
00062   { 0xFF, 0x00, 0xFF },     /* Cyan                                                                         */
00063   { 0x00, 0x00, 0xFF },     /* Blue                                                                         */
00064   { 0x00, 0x4B, 0x82 },     /* Indigo                                                                       */
00065   { 0x08, 0x80, 0x80 },     /* Violet                                                                       */
00066 };
00067 
00068 u32 i, j, k;
00069 
00070 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00071 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00072   * @brief  Main program.
00073   * @retval None
00074   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00075 int main(void)
00076 {
00077   SLED_Configuration();
00078 
00079   while (1)
00080   {
00081     SLED_MainRoutine();
00082   }
00083 }
00084 
00085 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00086   * @brief  Configure the SLED.
00087   * @retval None
00088   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00089 void SLED_Configuration(void)
00090 {
00091   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00092      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00093      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below this function.
00094   */
00095   SLED_InitTypeDef SLED_InitStruct;
00096   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00097 
00098   /* Enable SLED & AFIO APB clock                                                                           */
00099   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO             = 1;
00100   HTCFG_SLED_CLK(CKCUClock)      = 1;
00101   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00102 
00103   /* Configure GPIO to SLED mode                                                                            */
00104   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_SLED_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SLED);
00105 
00106   /* Configure SLED                                                                                         */
00107   SLED_InitStruct.ClockPrescaler = HTCFG_SLED_CK_PRESCALER;   /* F_PCLK / HTCFG_SLED_CK_PRESCALER= 20M Hz   */
00108   SLED_InitStruct.BaudRate       = HTCFG_SLED_BAUDRATE - 1;   /* F_SCLK/HTCFG_SLED_BAUDRATE      = 800K Hz  */
00109   SLED_InitStruct.T0H            = HTCFG_SLED_T0H - 1;        /* 5/25 = 20% Duty. 800K * (100/20)  = 4M Hz  */
00110   SLED_InitStruct.T1H            = HTCFG_SLED_TH1 - 1;        /* 20/25 = 80% Duty. 800K * (100/80) = 1M Hz  */
00111   SLED_InitStruct.SyncState      = SLED_SYNC_STATE_T0;
00112   SLED_InitStruct.IdleState      = SLED_IDLE_STATE_LOW;
00113   SLED_InitStruct.ResetState     = SLED_RESET_STATE_LOW;
00114   SLED_InitStruct.SyncMode       = SLED_SYNC_MODE_DISABLE;
00115   SLED_InitStruct.OutputPolarity = SLED_OUTPUT_NONINVERTING;
00116   SLED_Init(HTCFG_SLED, &SLED_InitStruct);
00117 
00118   /* Enable SLED                                                                                            */
00119   SLED_OutputCmd(HTCFG_SLED, ENABLE);
00120   SLED_FIFOTrigLevelConfig(HTCFG_SLED, SLED_FIFO_LEVEL_1);
00121   SLED_Cmd(HTCFG_SLED, ENABLE);
00122 }
00123 
00124 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00125   * @brief  SLED Main Routine.
00126   * @retval None
00127   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00128 void SLED_MainRoutine(void)
00129 {
00130   /* Select color type                                                                                      */
00131   for (i = 0; i < LED_NUMBER_OF_COLOR_TYPES; i++)
00132   {
00133     /* Select LED                                                                                           */
00134     for (j = 0; j < LED_STRIP_DISP_LEN; j++)
00135     {
00136       /* Select RGB                                                                                         */
00137       for (k = 0; k < LED_GRB_DATA_LEN; k++)
00138       {
00139         /* Send data                                                                                        */
00140         HTCFG_SLED->DR_8BIT = gGRBTable[i][k];  /* RGB Data. 8-bit access, duplicate 4 times into 32-bit    */
00141       }
00142       /* Waiting for transfer to complete                                                                   */
00143       while (SLED_GetFIFOStatus(HTCFG_SLED) != 0);
00144     }
00145    /* Delay                                                                                                 */
00146     __Delay(SystemCoreClock/30);
00147   }
00148 }
00149 
00150 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00151 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00152   * @brief  delay function
00153   * @param  count: delay count for loop
00154   * @retval None
00155   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00156 static void __Delay(u32 count)
00157 {
00158   while (count--)
00159   {
00160     __NOP(); // Prevent delay loop be optimized
00161   }
00162 }
